mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_TB( user_id, password, email, invite_url, activate, created_at, updated_at, login_count )values ( #{userId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{inviteUrl}, 1, NOW(), NOW(), 0 );
mapper.select: SELECT DATEDIFF(DAY, updated_at, CURRENT_DATE) FROM USER_TB WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_TB SET login_count = #{loginCount} WHERE id = #{id};
UPDATE USER_TB SET activate = #{activate} WHERE id = #{id};
